title: Patch Notes
content: ill him. Wulbren will no longer comment on Toobin's daughter being dead if Toobin is not present. Civilians talking to Carrion's zombies will now leave if said zombies either die or leave to Philgrave's Mansion. You can now return Mol's eyepatch to her when you find her in the Guildhall. Gave Sticky Dondo more lines to yell to sell his wares in the Guildhall. When Minsc meets Nine-Fingers after the Zhent coup, the skill checks will now affect Minsc instead of Nine-Fingers to match the narrative.
